definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The present case needs to reduce the air-resistance to the minimum.
sentences.chinese: 現在需要的是把空氣阻力減小到最低限度。

sentences.english: He always slipstreams others when running on the way.
sentences.chinese: 途中跑時，他總是跟跑以減小空氣阻力。

sentences.english: But they also battle against air resistance.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們也跟空氣阻力作鬥爭。

sentences.english: I can never take air drag out.
That way it would meet less air resistance and go further.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可以有效減小子彈的空氣阻力，並增加射程。

sentences.english: Now comes my last part, and that is, how does air drag influence trajectories?
sentences.chinese: 現在是最後一部分，就是，空氣阻力如何影響軌道？

sentences.english: This only holds if there is no air drag, no friction of any kind.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有空氣阻力，沒有任何摩擦。

sentences.english: Slight difference because of air resistance, it will slow down a bit.
sentences.chinese: 因爲空氣阻力的關係，下降的時候稍微慢了一點點。

sentences.english: Air speed provides the lifting force and the drag.
sentences.chinese: 大氣速度提供舉升力和空氣阻力。

sentences.english: Turbulent air flow would hug the curvature of the ball, reducing drag.
sentences.chinese: 湍流將緊挨着球的曲面，從而減少足球的空氣阻力。

sentences.english: There is air drag on that tennis ball.
Its is actually acted upon by two forces , air resistance and friction resistance with the ice.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種力量分別是，空氣阻力和冰面摩擦力。

sentences.english: Dave So I asked Dave, "What is the effect of air drag on this apple?
sentences.chinese: 所以我問，“空氣阻力如何作用於蘋果？
